subject: Re: [junit] Message texts
msgSnippet: ... Even for assertions that don t use assertEquals()? That s interesting. Can you give us an example of this? Thanks. -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar Software
messageBody:
James P. Gunderson wrote:

>
> We use a slightly more naive approach for the messages associated with
> failed assertions. We display an Expected: XXX got: YYY construction.

Even for assertions that don't use assertEquals()? That's interesting.
Can you give us an example of this?

Thanks.
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
